bug.author: djstrong
bug.summary: Flair embeddings are computed over tokenized string instead of original
bug.description:
Describe the bug Flair embeddings in Sentence are computed over to_tokenized_string instead of to_plain_string. It is inconsistent with trained language model. Sometimes whitespaces are important. Expected behavior Flair embeddings in Sentence should be computed over to_plain_string. Environment:
Version: flair-0.4.2
I have made the question here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/flairNLP/flair/pull/72#issuecomment-523068227>#72 (comment)</denchmark-link> but an issue is more appropriate place.
